body_html: @SsnL Hmm I agree that it would be nice to provide precision_matrix as a lazy_property. It would be even more useful to provide it as an optional arg to __init__, just as scale_tril can currently be a substitute for covariance_matrix. This would be especially nice because the precision_matrix often has block structure or another sparsity pattern, and is useful as a parameterization. I'm happy to review a PR if you submit one.

body: @SsnL Hmm I agree that it would be nice to provide `precision_matrix` as a `lazy_property`. It would be even more useful to provide it as an optional arg to `__init__`, just as `scale_tril` can currently be a substitute for `covariance_matrix`. This would be especially nice because the `precision_matrix` often has block structure or another sparsity pattern, and is useful as a parameterization. I'm happy to review a PR if you submit one.
